definition: swimming ability/characteristics of a body of water (depth, currents etc)/aqueous/water-based (paint etc)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: High crosslink starch nearly didn't dissolve in boiled water and could sop up more water.
sentences.chinese: 高交联淀粉溶解性能降低，而吸水性能增强。

sentences.english: This article describes briefly the preparation technology and the main performance of waterborne high temperature anticorrosion coatings.
sentences.chinese: 简述了水性高温防腐涂料的制备工艺及主要性能。

sentences.english: It used in the spray application of water cements and white cements.
sentences.chinese: 用于水性胶及白胶喷雾式涂布。

sentences.english: For hydrophilic materials, the contact angle will be lower than 90 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 亲水性材料的接触角度会低于90度。

sentences.english: The surface hydrophobicity of coal increases by adsorbing nitrifying bacteria and quinoline in surface.
sentences.chinese: 通过吸附硝化细菌和喹啉在表面增加煤的表面疏水性。

sentences.english: For water intake pump house pressure water test shall be made on the bedrock so as to define its permeability.
sentences.chinese: 取水泵房处在基岩中进行压水试验，以确定其透水性。

sentences.english: The one-component waterborne is classified into two systems, linear and crosslinking systems.
sentences.chinese: 单组分水性聚氨酯主要包括线型和交联型二种。

sentences.english: Yes, they got divorced, for his wife was unstable as water.
sentences.chinese: 是的，他们离婚了，因为他的妻子水性杨花。

sentences.english: Mechanical pulps are made to different freeness or drainage rates.
sentences.chinese: 机械浆根据不同的游离度和滤水性生产。

sentences.english: Effective fabrics softener excellent water absorbency, no yellowing.
sentences.chinese: 非常好的柔软效果，吸水性佳，不黄变。

sentences.english: Paints and adhesives that are used in production are water-based.
sentences.chinese: 在生产中使用的油漆和粘合剂水性。

sentences.english: SkimWoodFilla is a ready-mixed water-based fast drying interior filler for furniture covering grains and holes on wood surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 实坚木器补泥是一种快干现成混合水性木器填料。

sentences.english: Then the scientists made the glass beads hydrophobic.
sentences.chinese: 然后，科学家们把玻璃珠变成疏水性的。

sentences.english: Any water-based masterbatch colors can be mixed to use.
sentences.chinese: 您可随意掺入水性色母调出您想要的颜色。

sentences.english: He has been uneasy with this woman's skittish.
sentences.chinese: 他一直都介意这个女人的水性杨花。
